short_summary: K0F70 - 230251 - Storage garage construction at Environment and Climate Change Canada compound in Whitehorse, Yukon
description: Construction of a new 211 m2 storage garage for Environment and Climate Change Canada at 91782 Alaska Highway Whitehorse, Yukon. The project aims to provide a sustainable and efficient facility for the department.
full_summary:
**Project Title:** K0F70-230251 - Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) Enforcement Garage
=============================================

**Reference Number:** WS3674451365-Doc3676505610
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** WS3674451365
**Publication Date:** September 28, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 19, 2022, at 14:00 EDT
**Amendment Date:** February 23, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** November 25, 2022
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Procurement Information:**
================================

This procurement is a Competitive - Selective Tendering (CST) process. The Eligible Bids will be selected based on lowest price. The complete technical specifications and drawings can be found in the [bid package](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14220378?extsite=MTQyMjAzNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Trade Agreements:**
--------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contracting Entity Information:**
-----------------------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Phone: None
* Fax: None
* Email: Janie.Leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Project Description:**
------------------------

The ECCC Enforcement Garage project involves the construction of a new 211 m2 storage garage within the Environment and Climate Change Canada compound located at 91782 Alaska Highway, Whitehorse, Yukon.

**Timeline:**
-------------

Bidders must submit their qualifications by October 19, 2022, at 17:00 EDT. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all bidders. Upon completion of the first phase, the qualified bidders will be invited to provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Important Note:**
-----------------

Please note that the amendments to the tender have resulted in a revised tender closing date of October 19, 2022. Bidders must submit their bids and all required supporting documentation by 17:00 EDT on this date. B
